mapper.insert: insert into Home_Inq_tb (iq_num, imcha_id, home_num, iq_title, iq_content) values ((select nvl(max(iq_num), 0) + 1 from Home_Inq_tb), #{imchaId}, #{homeNum}, #{iqTitle}, #{iqContent})
insert into Home_InqAns_tb (ans_num, iq_num, lessor_id, ans_content) values ((select nvl(max(ans_num), 0) + 1 from Home_InqAns_tb), #{iqNum}, #{lessorId}, #{ansContent})
mapper.delete: delete from Home_InqAns_tb where lessor_id=#{lessorId} and iq_num = #{iqNum}
mapper.update: update Home_InqAns_tb set ans_status = 1 where iq_num = #{iqNum}
